item.title: 13 Amazing Benefits And Side Effects of Green Tea
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: Green tea is one of the world’s most popular health drinks. It is derived from the plant Camellia sinensis. Green tea is excellent for your health because it includes catechins, a healthy component with numerous health benefits. This article covers the 13 benefits of green tea and why you should drink it regularly.  Keep reading… Read More »13 Amazing Benefits And Side Effects of Green Tea

item.title: 10 Major Health Benefits of Buckwheat Tea
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: Buckwheat tea or soba cha is a healthy gluten-free beverage that promotes weight loss and provides many health benefits.  It is made from the seeds of the buckwheat plant, a pseudocereal that has the qualities of cereal but is not counted in the list of cereals. item.title: 8 Major Health Benefits Of Yellow Tea
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description: Yellow tea is one of the most expensive and luxurious teas in the world. It has a delicious silky taste and distinctive aroma. In Chinese tradition, it is known as huángchá. In the early days, yellow tea was reserved for royal and elite people, but now it is available among the masses and gaining popularity… Read More »8 Major Health Benefits Of Yellow Tea
